response.overview: This is the story of two powerful drug traffickers who fight for the cartel in the region. One of them, Manuel Salcido, helps the men and women of the town, with the harvest and building the church they so badly need, thus earning the friendship and trust of all. The other Jorge Labastida is a despotic mobster, who at any cost wants to kill Salcido and strip him of his territory.
response.title: Narcos Alterados
